title: Depth Map Data
description: Generates depth graphic from a 2D scene. This contains a bitmap for a grayscale graphic which represents depth with the same dimensions as the original image and a scaling factor to convert depth to real-world distance

depth-map.description: Normalized 2D representation of Depth from 0 to 1. Single channel float32 JPG with the same dimensions as the original image. Low values are closer to the camera while larger values are further away.

scaling.description: Max distance to meter conversion, 0 for no scaling. Without scaling, the depth map is unchanged and will contain values from 0 to 1. With scaling, the depth can be converted to distance. Ex: Scaling value is set to 10, meaning the maximum distance in the depth map represents 10 meters, this can then be used to convert the depth to distance from 0 to 10 meters rather than a depth map with values from 0 to 1.
